entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Winnipeg (The Forks)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winnipeg - The Forks 04:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -25.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -28.7°C
Wind: NW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
